verses.verse: He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H175>you,<s%> and Aaron, <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> from a <S%H7350>distance.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> alone shall come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but they shall not come <S%H5066>near,<s%> neither shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> go up with <S%H5927>him.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all the <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "All the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>spoken<s%> will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> under the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and twelve <S%H4676>pillars<s%> for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of <S%H6499>cattle<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it in <S%H101>basins,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> it in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "All that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> will we <S%H6213>do,<s%> and be <S%H8085>obedient.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1818>"Look,<s%> this is the blood of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3772>made<s%> with you concerning all these <S%H1697>words.<s%>"
Then <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

They <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Under his <S%H7272>feet<s%> was like a <S%H3840>paved<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of sapphire <S%H5601>stone,<s%> like <S%H6106>the<s%> <S%H8064>skies<s%> for <S%H2892>clearness.<s%>

He <S%H7971>didn't<s%> lay his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H678>nobles<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to me on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and stay <S%H5414>here,<s%> and I will give you the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> with the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commands<s%> that I have <S%H3789>written,<s%> that you may teach <S%H3384>them.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> his <S%H8334>servant,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> onto <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H2022>Mountain.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H3427>"Wait<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%> for <S%H7725>us,<s%> until we come again to <S%H175>you.<s%> Behold, Aaron and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> are with <S%H4310>you.<s%> Whoever <S%H1167>is<s%> involved in a <S%H1697>dispute<s%> <S%H1167>can<s%> go to <S%H5066>them.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7931>settled<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was like <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
